messages.messageBody:
http://www.geocities.jp/web_ukiyoe/index.html

Not sure if this has been posted, but it shows some reproductions of the '53 stations... '
print series alongside old photographs of the same location.

The site is in Japanese, but the linguistically-challenged amongst us can find our way
through, I think.

Thomas
